topics.title: Getting Started
topics.content:
Getting Started

Welcome to azOS Second Edition! This guide will help you get started with the basics.

topics.title: Using the Desktop
topics.content:
Using the Desktop

The desktop is your main workspace. You can launch applications, open files, and customize its appearance.

children.title: Desktop Icons
children.content:
Desktop Icons

Icons on the desktop represent applications and files.

children.title: Taskbar
children.content:
The Taskbar

The taskbar contains the Start button, running applications, and the system tray.
